entries.duel_6: You did it! Here's what I owe you.
entries.duel_5: Fine.  Just wait for him to attack, and then let him have it!
entries.player_5: No way, I'm out of here!
entries.duel_4: I'm not sure I'm good enough.  If you'll fight for me I'll pay you.  Will you do it?
entries.player_4: Ok, I'll let you two get at it.
entries.duel_2: My honor was insulted and now I will duel with my opponent over there.
entries.duel_1: I'm a little busy at the moment...
